text: Adevinta One Cloud Program,

partnering with AWS
Training and Certification
and the Skill Guild
to enable us and help us on this process,
to enable all these engineers
to work on the new technological scenario.
We build the training program
composed of different learning paths
specific for every technical domain.
We choose AWS Skills Guild

because of the framework they
provide to embed this training

as part of the day-to-day
of the engineers.

We choose the solution because
we consider that the training

is not only important to
deliver the knowledge,

it'll also have to be
practical and it has to be fun.
This is very important for us.

And the content within
the AWS Skills Guild
and the Skills Builder are delivering us

a lot of opportunity for
gamification of the learning.
What benefits our business
is the cloud native ways of working.
Because if we work with the cloud

and with the mindset
that the cloud requires,
we'll bring a lot of benefits
related to experiment more often,

experiment harder, faster
delivery of value to the users.
And if we are able to do this,

our end users are going to
receive more and more features

and more and more value, which
is a benefit for the users
and it's a benefit for the industry.
